text: Lord and Lady Algy is a comedy play by the British writer R. C. Carton which premiered in London in 1898. In New York it played at the Empire Theatre in 1899. ==Film adaptation== In 1919 the play was turned into an American silent film of the same title directed by Harry Beaumont.Goble p.74 ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. Category:1898 plays Category:British plays adapted into films Category:Plays set in England Category:Plays by R. C. Carton
title: Lord and Lady Algy (play)
